Contact Form Example

Feb 13, 2022 test, forms, docs 1 min

The contact form include can be linked with Basin easily. Use the email option in the /_config.yml to change to the email submissions will be sent to. If you’d like to use a different thank you page, set it in _includes/contact-form.html. Just change the thanks_url="/some-other-page/" tag to some other value. Send me a message Name Email Message Send

Markdown Example

Jan 28, 2022 test, markdown, docs 2 mins

You can write regular markdown here and Jekyll will automatically convert it to a nice webpage. I strongly encourage you to take 5 minutes to learn how to write in markdown - it’ll teach you how to transform regular text into bold/italics/headings/tables/etc.
